comment.author: 26105073@N03
comment._content: Hawker Sea Fury TG120 Royal Canadian Navy is described here: www.ody.ca/~bwalker/RCN_Sea_Furies.html -- TG120 Hawker Sea Fury F. B. Mk.11 -- first date: 24 May 1947 - Taken on charge -- Used for deck landing trials onboard HMCS Magnificant, in UK waters, from 4 May 1948, in RN markings. Still in RN markings during early days at Shearwater. Took part in first Naval air show in Canada, at Shearwater on 21 July 1948, in early RCN markings by then, including blue maple leaf over red centre of RN roundels. Group Commander's aircraft summer of 1948, coded "*B GC". With VF 870 when it ditched on 12 June 1951. -- last date: 23 July 1951 - Struck off
